name: Portal Pong (Asith)
description:
I put Portals in Pong! This game was made in a couple days for #PongJam. It ended up being more of a demo or proof-of-concept than anything else, since I could totally see this game having a lot more crazy mechanics and gamemodes at some point, and maybe even a level-based campaign mode! Probably won't actually develop all that though; not unless this is received really really well :P

Best played with 2 Players, but singleplayer mode works too. 10 points to victory.

Controls
  • Player 1: W and S
  • Player 2: Up Arrow and Down Arrow
  • Pause: Esc or P
Gamemodes
  • Paddle Portals: 
    The paddles are direct portals to the center! Focus on the middle!
  • Portal Frenzy:
    The classic Pong you love, but with Portals everywhere!
Credits

This game was thrown together by Asith (@AsithDevs on Twitter). Stick around for more random stuff. I have no idea what I could make next!
